data.title: Prince & Donna Summer
data.text:
thedance

I wonder.. maybe the Prince song "Donna" is about the "nasty" Donna Summer, who knows???

Ps... I love Donna Summer,

Bad Girls is an amazing album

Disc: 1

1. Hot Stuff

2. Bad Girls

3. Love Will Always Find You

4. Walk Away

5. Dim All The Lights

6. Journey To The Center Of Your Heart

7. One Night In A Lifetime

8. Can't Get To Sleep At Night

9. On My Honour

10. There Will Always Be A You

11. All Through The Night

12. My Baby Understands

13. Our Love

14. Lucky

15. Sunset People

16. Bad Girls (Demo Version)

Disc: 2

1. I Feel Love (12" Single)

2. Last Dance (Promo 12" Mix)

3. Mac Arthur Park Suite (12" Single)

4. Hot Stuff (12" Single)

5. Bad Girls (12" Single)

6. Walk Away (Promo 12" Mix)

7. Dim All The Lights (12" Single)

8. No More Tears (Enough Is Enough) feat Barbra Streisand (12" Single)

9. On The Radio (Long Version)

[Edited 5/10/09 14:50pm]

Prince 4Ever.

vainandy

I wonder.. maybe the Prince song "Donna" is about the "nasty" Donna Summer, who knows???

"Bad Girls" is one of my favorite albums of all time.

Andy is a four letter word.

SoulAlive

NouveauDance said:

It's a shame nothing ever happened in the 80s, can't see much coming of anything now. Donna's last album was very disappointing except for one maybe two tracks tops.

Donna would have never collaborated with Prince in the 80s She became a born again Christian in 1980 and even stopped performing some of her own "nasty" songs recorded earlier in her career.

She would probably work with him nowadays,since he's all religious now.

purplecam

NouveauDance said:

It's a shame nothing ever happened in the 80s, can't see much coming of anything now. Donna's last album was very disappointing except for one maybe two tracks tops.

I agree with you, especially about the CD. That would have been HOT if they had collaborated. It would be cool now too. I would definately dig it.

I'm not a fan of "old Prince". I'm not a fan of "new Prince". I'm just a fan of Prince. Simple as that

purplecam

vainandy said:

"Bad Girls" is one of my favorite albums of all time.

Mine too. Not a bad song on there. EVERYONE needs to buy this Deluxe Set.

I'm not a fan of "old Prince". I'm not a fan of "new Prince". I'm just a fan of Prince. Simple as that

shorttrini

[Edited 5/10/09 14:50pm]

She is the second most underrated singers of all time, (Gladys, being the first). Donna does not get the credit that she deserves. Did you all notice that Donna also has a song called "Journey to the center of your heart"?

"Love is like peeing in your pants, everyone sees it but only you feel its warmth"
